description: Ripped cutie Armond Rizzo can’t seem to get any sleep with his noisy roommate, Michael Roman, playing loud music so early in the morning. He begs and pleads for the muscular top to turn it down, but to no avail. He heads into his room, and catches him dancing naked! He’s instantly turned on by Michael’s huge, thick cock, and waits for him to return home later in the day with his spread ass cheeks. Will Michael take the bait and put it in him?
title: Put It in Me
